dataset_id: BOREAS AFM-04 Twin Otter Aircraft Flux Data
title: BOREAS AFM-04 Twin Otter Aircraft Flux Data
summary: Measurements in the boundary layer of the fluxes of sensible and latent heat, momentum, ozone, methane, and carbon dioxide, plus supporting meteorological parameters such as temperature, humidity, and wind speed and direction.
